name: Pathroom
description:
- PATHROOM -

Two alien spouses, Blip and Bloop, are stranded high in the sky atop tiny pillars and it's your job to reunite them! Use the puzzle pieces to create a single room to bring together the two lost lovers.

Pathroom is a short puzzle game that was made for the Indie Tales Game Jam over the course of 72 hours. The jam theme was "One Room".

Controls:

Left Mouse Button: pick up and put down puzzle pieces

Spacebar: rotate selected puzzle piece (available after stage 4)

Escape: pause/menu

Credits:

Art: SJPixels (https://twitter.com/PixelsSj)

Programming: Kyle (https://github.com/KyleWelfare)

Comments:

Upheaval font by Ænigma was used under free-use for some of the UI. The font can be found here: https://www.dafont.com/upheaval.font

Unfortunately, the WebGL build seems to be having trouble with FMOD. The volume control works perfectly in Unity and in the PC builds, but doesn't work in WebGL. This will hopefully be fixed in the future.

The game was intended to be played in browser, so if you download and play the Windows version there won't be an exit feature. You will have to alt-f4 or use the task manager to get out of it.
